title: Fragments: A JUDD Novella
description: Fantasy takes a back seat in this contemporary-slow burn-style novella told by Samael Judd about how his worst enemy became his most trusted friend.Eastview High sure isn’t the school of his dreams, that would in fact be Aries High—unfavorable teachers, bullies, and his biggest one of them all, Casey Burke, followed him from middle school to his freshman high school year.But is the school as bad as Sam says? Or is he just having a rebellious outburst and projecting his misery onto everyone around him?
author: J.D. Toombs
